profile.name: Ian
profile.title: Software Engineer & Designer
bio: I'm a software engineer with a passion for creating elegant, user-centered digital experiences. With a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from Arizona State University and an Associate's degree in Mathematics & Computer Science, I blend technical knowledge with creative problem-solving.

As an Evergreen ILS specialist at Bibliomation Inc., I contribute to open-source projects involving PostgreSQL, Perl, and Angular. My interests span across game development (particularly with Godot and Lua), generative AI technologies, and front-end design systems.
When I'm not coding, you might find me creating music, taking photographs, or designing visual art—creative pursuits that inform my approach to software development.
